messages.content: ComfyUI nodes to track objects in videos using YOLOv8.
Clone or download this repo into your `ComfyUI/custom_nodes/` directory and then run `pip install -r requirements.txt` within the cloned repo.
How to configure models for ComfyUI-TrackingNodes?
Download one of the YOLOv8 models from https://github.com/ultralytics/ultralytics and place it into `ComfyUI/custom_nodes/ComfyUI-TrackingNodes/models/yolov8`
What are some accompanying node repos for ComfyUI-TrackingNodes?
